title: 115.41 DEFINITIONS.
text:
The definitions given in this section shall obtain for the purposes of sections 115.41 to 115.53, except as otherwise expressly provided or indicated by the context.
The definitions given in section 115.01 shall govern for the purposes of sections 115.41 to 115.53, except as otherwise expressly provided or indicated by the context.
[Repealed, 1969 c 9 s 20]
MS 1990 [Renumbered subd 6]
"Agency" means the Minnesota Pollution Control Agency.
MS 1990 [Renumbered subd 2]
"Commissioner" means the commissioner of administration.
MS 1990 [Renumbered subd 4]
"Municipality" means a city, sanitary district, or other governmental subdivision or public corporation.
